target_markets.market_description: NFT traders and collectors active on OpenSea
pain_points: lack of token rewards for trading
target_markets.market_size_indicators: OpenSea valued at $13.3 billion indicates massive NFT marketplace opportunity

problems_validated.severity: High - users seeking alternatives with better incentives
problems_validated.market_gap: No token rewards or staking opportunities for marketplace users

products_tools.name: Capchase
products_tools.use_case: Access revenue today for fast-growing startups to reinvest and scale
products_tools.pricing: no dilution, no interest if not drawn
products_tools.metrics: easy setup with couple of clicks

products_tools.name: Common Stock
products_tools.use_case: Platform for verified investment knowledge sharing with actual brokerage connections
products_tools.metrics: includes stocks and crypto, verified track records

products_tools.name: LooksRare
products_tools.use_case: NFT marketplace competing with OpenSea using token incentives

business_strategies.strategy: Vampire attack - incentivize competitors' users to switch platforms using token airdrops
business_strategies.implementation: Airdrop valuable tokens based on historical usage of competitor platform, require simple action to claim
business_strategies.expected_results: User migration from established platform to new platform
business_strategies.case_study: LooksRare vs OpenSea - airdropped LOOKS tokens based on OpenSea transaction volume

business_strategies.strategy: Token-based marketplace rewards with staking mechanism
business_strategies.implementation: Issue platform tokens, create staking pools with high APR to retain users
business_strategies.expected_results: User retention and platform engagement through financial incentives
business_strategies.case_study: LooksRare offering 950% APR for staking LOOKS tokens

problems_solutions.problem: How to claim and stake LooksRare airdrop tokens
problems_solutions.solution: List any NFT for sale on LooksRare platform to claim tokens, then stake them for rewards
steps: List an NFT for sale on LooksRare
Stake tokens on platform for APR rewards

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Not participating in token airdrops early
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Missing out on free valuable tokens - example shows $480+ in free LOOKS tokens
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Stay informed about new platform launches and airdrop opportunities
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Speaker was late to LooksRare airdrop but still claimed significant value

growth_tactics.tactic: Vampire attack using token airdrops to steal users from competitors
steps: Require minimal platform engagement to claim
Offer staking rewards to retain users

metrics_kpis.benchmark: 950% APR mentioned for LOOKS token staking
metrics_kpis.tracking_method: Live tracker on platform showing real-time APR
metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: Gamified display of rewards to encourage participation

trends_signals.trend: Vampire attacks becoming common strategy for new platforms
trends_signals.opportunity: New platforms can quickly acquire users from established competitors using token incentives
Users seeking platforms that reward participation rather than just facilitate transactions

actionable_quotes.quote: they were just giving you free money right
actionable_quotes.context: Describing the LooksRare token airdrop value
actionable_quotes.actionability: Highlights importance of participating in new platform launches for potential token rewards

key_statistics.statistic: OpenSea raised $13.3 billion in new round of venture funding
key_statistics.context: Showing the massive valuation of the dominant NFT marketplace
High reward rate for staking tokens on LooksRare platform
Example of airdrop value received by speaker
